alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Gwinnett and northeastern Fulton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Johns Creek, or near Peachtree Corners, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Peachtree Corners, Johns Creek, Duluth, Norcross and Berkeley Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
